label: HIE of One
Description1: HIE of One (Health Information Exchange of One) is a volunteer-driven open source project to combine emerging standards for access authorization (Kantara UMA) and emerging standards for blockchain-based self-sovereign identity (DID) into a patient-centered health record infrastructure.
Open feedback: Great start. It will be interesting to see how editing and expanding works interactively.
description:
#
##About HIE of One
![About HIE of One](https://www.youtube.com/embed/N_3DbDZUTIg)
 ###HIE of One (Health Information Exchange of One) is a volunteer-driven open source project to combine emerging standards for access authorization (Kantara UMA) and emerging standards for blockchain-based self-sovereign identity (DID) into a patient-centered health record infrastructure.
